name: shadowverse-battle-log-backend
description: Shadowverse Battle Log - Azure Functions Backend

scripts.copy: cp host.json dist/ && cp package.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/functions/getBattleLogs dist/functions/createBattleLog dist/functions/deleteBattleLog dist/functions/health dist/functions/importData dist/functions/getStatistics && cp src/functions/getBattleLogs/function.json dist/functions/getBattleLogs/ && cp src/functions/createBattleLog/function.json dist/functions/createBattleLog/ && cp src/functions/deleteBattleLog/function.json dist/functions/deleteBattleLog/ && cp src/functions/health/function.json dist/functions/health/ && cp src/functions/importData/function.json dist/functions/importData/ && cp src/functions/getStatistics/function.json dist/functions/getStatistics/
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build
